message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $14,000. I believe it offers tremendous value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $13,000?
Alice, I understand you need a price closer to your value, but $13,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  This is my final offer.  Let me know if it works for you.
